name: A long thunderstruck leather cape
data: It increases the users strength poorly.
It increases the users dexterity impressively.
It increases the users constitution poorly.
It decreases the users intelligence poorly.
It has awesome armour class for its type (little in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration a bit.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration somewhat.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It increases the users electric resistance strongly.
The wearer becomes more attuned to the elemental forces.
